bug.summary: OpenCV Manager: Motorola Droid Turbo hardware not detected
bug.description:

<denchmark-code>|| Zachary Phillips on 2015-05-04 01:34 || Priority: Normal || Affected: 2.4.9 (latest release) || Category: android || Tracker: Bug || Difficulty: || PR: || Platform: ARM / Android </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>OpenCV Manager: Motorola Droid Turbo hardware not detected</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>OpenCv Manager (Android) does not detect the Motorola Droid Turbo hardware. Problem is easily replicated by installing any example problem which connects to the library using async initialization. See: http://answers.opencv.org/question/52161/motorola-droid-turbo-hardware-not-detected/ </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>History</denchmark-h>
